text: Zmina (anheliv) zminyayetesya po cherzi, zalyshayuchysʹ z kozhnym odyn z vas - vony ye pered vamy ta pozadu vas. Vony zalyshayutʹsya z vamy, ta pylʹnuyutʹ vas z·hidno z BOZHYMY komandamy. Otzhe, BOH ne minyaye umovu budʹ-yakykh lyudey yakshcho ne vony sebe vynesutʹ rishennya zminytysya. Yakshcho BOH wills budʹ-yaki neharazdy dlya budʹ-yakykh lyudey, niyaka syla ne mozhe zupynyty tse. Dlya vony nikhto ne mayutʹ bilya Yoho tomu shcho Lord ta Mayster
